actions.name: Peck
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Ghost Wings
actions.desc: The ravenfolk scout furiously “beats” a set of phantasmal wings. Each creature within 5 feet of the ravenfolk must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The ravenfolk scout can mimic animal sounds and Humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Insight) check.
